def_cn: 辐射状的；向各方向伸展的；放射状的
def_en: Radial refers to the pattern that you get when straight lines are drawn from the centre of a circle to a number of points round the edge.
A radial or a radial tyre is a tyre which is strengthened inside by cords that point towards the centre of the wheel. Radials are less likely to slide sideways on wet or icy roads than other tyres.
